alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 3:28PM EST until January 07 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Central and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected late this evening when when snowfall rates of 1-2 inches per hour are possible. Visibility will be reduced to near or less than one- quarter mile during the heaviest snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
